answer:
<p>To work with elements inside <code>iframe</code> you must switch to this specific <code>iframe</code>. </p>

<p>Your solution <code>.switchTo().frame("FRAMENAME");</code> is correct. Selenium does not have any other ways to work with <code>iframe</code> wrappers.</p>
